name: Explore Fuel
author: Fuel
description: A modern and user-friendly tool that allows real-time analysis and monitoring of the Fuel blockchain, providing detailed insights into transactions, blocks, and smart contracts.

name: Fuel Front-Chain
author: Cumulo
description: Explore the Fuel dashboard by Cumulo, your ultimate tool for monitoring and analyzing real-time data from the Fuel blockchain

name: Fuel Wallet
author: Fuel
description: With the Fuel Wallet,you can explore DApps on Fuel and manage your crypto assets, all in one place

name: Fuelet
author: Fuelet
description: The leading and non-custodial account abstraction wallet on Fuel

name: Fuel Bridge
author: Fuel
description: The Fuel Bridge allows users to seamlessly transfer assets between the Ethereum and Fuel blockchains.
